etymologies: early 19th century: from bug+ bane, with reference to the former use of the species C. foetida to drive away bedbugs

definitions: a tall plant with spikes of cream or yellow flowers. A member of the buttercup family, it is native to north temperate regions.

notes.text: Genus Cimicifuga, family Ranunculaceae: several species, in particular the American bugbane (C. americana) of the eastern US and the black cohosh (C. racemosa)
